mapper.select:
SELECT fjcfb.wjlj,fjcfb.wjm from igams_sjxx sjxx left outer join matridx_fjcfb fjcfb on sjxx.sjid= fjcfb.ywid and fjcfb.ywlx in ('IMP_REPORT_C_TEMEPLATE_D','IMP_REPORT_C_TEMEPLATE_R', 'IMP_REPORT_C_TEMEPLATE_C','IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_D','IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_R','IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_C', 'IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_REM_D','IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_REM_R','IMP_REPORT_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_REM_C', 'IMP_REPORT_ONCO_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_D', 'IMP_REPORT_ONCO_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_R', 'IMP_REPORT_ONCO_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_C', 'IMP_REPORT_ONCO_QINDEX_TEMEPLATE_O', 'IMP_REPORT_TNGS_TEMEPLATE_D','IMP_REPORT_TNGS_TEMEPLATE_C','IMP_SPEED_D','IMP_SPEED_R','IMP_SPEED_C','IMP_SPEED_REM_D','IMP_SPEED_REM_R','IMP_SPEED_REM_C')
sjxx.hzxm = #{hzxm}
